casebody.data:
HILL
v.
HILL. No. 138P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. Garford T. Hill, Pro Se, Cindy Hill Ford, Edward C. Hay, Jr., Asheville, for Garford T. & Jewel A. Hill.

"The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of April 2007 by Plaintiff for Sanctions and Notice Regarding the Dependency of Federal Bankruptcy Court Proceedings on Ruling in 138P06-2: Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007."
